intension: Design a premium and high quality emblem for a coffee house that emphasizes on the freshness and aroma of the coffee served. The text 'Coffee & More' is included to show that there is more to offer than just coffee.

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white coffee cup with steam coming out of it, placed on a red background. The cup is positioned towards the center of the image, and the steam appears to be rising from the top of the cup.
